snippet.title: Pictures of Nvidia “Tegra Tab” point to more conventional Tegra 4 tablet
snippet.description: ...Especially in the last year, Nvidia has displayed a desire to augment its traditional chipmaking efforts with hardware of its own. This desire has surfaced in the form of server products like the Nvidia Gridand in gadgets like the oft-delayed, price-cut Shield gaming tablet. Leaked images of yet another piece of Nvidia hardware suggest that the company's next hardware effort may be something...
